Data entered from the documents on the Nature Conservation in West Africa: Red List for Benin. The following threat categories are recognized: EN=En danger, CR=En danger critique d'extinction, DD=Données insuffisantes, VU=Vulnérable, EW=Eteint à l'état sauvage, EX=Eteint, NT=Quasi menacé, LC=Préoccupation mineure, Not evaluated=Non évalué, Expected=Attendu|4,932 occurrences
